tutorial.label: New Features in 1.17.1 and 47
tutorial.description:
This panel describes some of the new features and behavior changes included in this update. This panel is applicable to Flutter SDK 1.17.1 and plugin 47.

To open this panel again later, select Help > What's New in Flutter from the main menu.

stepElement.section:
The dev channel isn't really new; it was introduced in plugin version 45. It is updated weekly with the latest changes from the master branch.

There are instructions on the web for how to use it. But now we can make it super easy! Just click the button below.

action.label: Use Dev Channel
action.successMessage: You are now using the dev channel of the Flutter plugin.

stepElement.section: If later you decide you don't want to use the dev channel, just come back here and click this button.

action.label: Use Stable Channel
action.successMessage: You are now using the stable channel of the Flutter plugin.
